alfredsnippet.snippet:
x = ['Product A', 'Product B', 'Product C']
y = [20, 14, 23]

data = [go.Bar(
            x=x,
            y=y,
            text=y,
            textposition = 'auto',
            marker=dict(
                color='rgb(158,202,225)',
                line=dict(
                    color='rgb(8,48,107)',
                    width=1.5),
            ),
            opacity=0.6
        )]

iplot(data, filename='bar-direct-labels')
alfredsnippet.name: plot plotly barplot labels
